title: Free Weekly Champ Rotation
body:
I am level 6 and still can't play the free weekly champs, i don't know why but it's pissing me off,  hate the people i can only play.
Anyone know why i can't play the free weekly?

replies.body: We [**recently changed the champion rotations**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864#h4q2) to make it a wee bit easier for newer players to get the hang of things! Once you hit level 11, you'll be back in the normal weekly champion rotation.
